definition.displayName: Silently sign in users to the OneDrive sync client with their Windows credentials

description:
What is it: Silently configures OneDrive for use with the primary Windows user and Files On Demand (FOD). 
 Simeon Notes: Files on demand allows users to store files in the cloud and have them immediately downloaded when accessed. 
 Learn More: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/sync-files-with-onedrive-files-on-demand-62e8d748-7877-420f-b600-24b56562aa70
